description:
Hibari fights furiously Phantom Knight furiously.  But is Hibari from the past any match for the him--?!  Meanwhile, Tsuna and the others stand before Ginger Bread. And Ginger determines Spanner to be a traitor and begins to attack him mercilessly. Even so, Spanner doesn`t stop programming. He looks calm, but the passionate spirit of a mechanic lies within him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: オペレーションX(イクス)
